titleInfo.title: Billy Block's Western Beat Americanmusic Showcase (Mar. 4)

mods.abstract: One color window card (black on white) announcing Billy Block's Western Beat American Music Showcase featuring Randy Sharp, Juice Newton, Steve Cochran, the Bum Steers, Lisa Blue and Barry Fasman, Robin Pearl, Randy Weeks, and George Highfill hosted by Billy Block at highland Grounds on March 4. Poster features a metal photoplate of Billy Block's Western Beat logo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
